# 内容顶栏 Content Top Bar

负责人：`chenxuanfeng`

## 使用

### 导入

```javascript
import { FixedBottomContainer } from '@seed/react';
//ContentBottomBar为页面底部浮层容器，适应iphoneX，可以传入要显示的子元素。
```

### Demo

```javascript
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import {
  FixedBottomContainer,
  AnimatedInteraction,
} from '../../packages/elements/src/react';
import '../style/fixed-bottom-container.less';

export default class FixedBottomContainerPage extends Component {
  constructor() {
    super();
    this.state = {
      collectData: { active: true, count: 5576 },
      likedata: { active: true, count: 342 },
    };
  }

  handleTapLike = () => {
    let { likedata } = this.state;
    if (likedata.active) {
      --likedata.count;
    } else {
      ++likedata.count;
    }
    likedata.active = !likedata.active;
    this.setState({ likedata: { ...likedata } });
  };

  handleTapCollect = () => {
    let { collectData } = this.state;
    if (collectData.active) {
      --collectData.count;
    } else {
      ++collectData.count;
    }
    collectData.active = !collectData.active;
    this.setState({ collectData: { ...collectData } });
  };

  render() {
    const { collectData, likedata } = this.state;

    return (
      <div className="seed-fixed-bottom-container-box">
        <FixedBottomContainer>
          <div className="seed-input-text" onClick={this.handleTapReply}>
            说点什么～
          </div>
          <div className="seed-btn-item" onClick={this.handleTapLike}>
            <AnimatedInteraction
              active={likedata.active}
              iconType="input-like"
              count={likedata.count}
            />
          </div>
          <div className="seed-btn-item" onClick={this.handleTapCollect}>
            <AnimatedInteraction
              active={collectData.active}
              iconType="input-collect"
              count={collectData.count}
            />
          </div>
          <div className="seed-btn-item" onClick={this.handleTapReply}>
            <i className="seed-reply-img" />
            <span className="seed-reply-text">2344</span>
          </div>
        </FixedBottomContainer>
      </div>
    );
  }
}
```

## API

### ContentBottomBar API

| 是否必传 | 属性     | 类型    | 默认值 | 说明             |
| -------- | -------- | ------- | ------ | ---------------- |
| √        | children | element |        | 子组件，按需传入 |

|
